net.sf.mmm.persistence.api

Interface RevisionMetadata

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LazyRevisionMetadata

    public interface RevisionMetadata
    This is the interface for the metadata associated with a historic revision of an entity.
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getCreator()
      This method gets the creator of this revision.
      Date getDate()
      This method gets the date when this revision was created (closed).
      Number getRevision()
      This method gets the revision number.

    • Method Detail

      • getRevision

        Number getRevision()
        This method gets the revision number.
        Returns:
        the revision number.

      • getDate

        Date getDate()
        This method gets the date when this revision was created (closed).
        Returns:
        the date of completion or null if the according entity is the latest revision.

      • getCreator

        Object getCreator()
        This method gets the creator of this revision. This can be a string (such as the principal-name) or an entity representing the according user.
        Returns:
        the creator. May be null (if committed outside user scope or if NOT supported at all).
